tweets.text: Main advantage of virtual conferences: You can watch talks while doing dishes. Main disadvantage: You have to watch talks while doing dishes, because everything else (teaching, projects, housework, life) continues undiminished. #ICA21

In short, while the level of inclusion and interactivity mostly seem to increase the experienced intensity of an immersive news experience, immersive narrative in form of a first-person narrative vs. a third-person narrative influenced the valence of emotional response #ICA21 3/4

IJ does not only mean to use inclusive technology - it also means different levels of interactivity and immersive narratives are used. These features might have different effects on the experienced emotions during an immersive news story. And we found that they do! #ICA21  2/4
